quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as if nothing is a miracle. The other is as if everything is a miracle.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You are the only problem you will ever have and you are the only solution.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: No man is happy unless he believes he is.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: Most people fail in life not because they aim too high and miss, but because they aim too low and hit.
author: Les Brown

quote: A mountain never yields to the wind no matter how strong it is.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: It doesn't matter what you do, only how well you do it.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Decide upon your major definite purpose in life and then organize all your activities around it.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: New beginnings are disguised as painful endings.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: To plant a garden is to believe in tomorrow.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: It's just a bad day, not a bad life.
author: Mary Engelbreit

quote: Truth is like the sun. You can shut it out for a time, but it ain't going away.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: Truth will always be truth, regardless of lack of understanding, disbelief or ignorance.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Wherever there is danger, there lurks opportunity; wherever there is opportunity, there lurks danger. The two are inseparable.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Why compare yourself with others? No one in the entire world can do a better job of being you than you.
author: Unknown

quote: Fears are nothing more than a state of mind.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the greatest intention.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Wherever you are, it's the place you need to be.
author: Maxime Lagace

quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: You will have bad times, but they will always wake you up to the stuff you weren't paying attention to.
author: Robin Williams

quote: A good stance and posture reflect a proper state of mind.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die.
author: Gilbert Chesterton

quote: Not doing it is certainly the best way to not getting it.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: We've got to live, no matter how many skies have fallen.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: The only problem we really have is we think we're not supposed to have problems! Problems call us to higher level- - face & solve them now!
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Happiness is not a goal...it's a by-product of a life well lived.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: To arrive at the simplest truth requires years of contemplation.
author: Isaac Newton
